definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards

sentences.english: The United States and the North Korean Government have reached understanding on the disposition of DPRK related funds frozen at Banco Delta Asia.
sentences.chinese: 美朝政府就澳門匯業銀行凍結朝鮮資金問題達成共識。

sentences.english: This sentence, of course, comes at a time when US-North Korean relations are already tense.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這次審判的時間正值美朝兩國關係緊張之時。

sentences.english: The two nuclear crises on the Korean Peninsula constituted the mainstream shaping the post-cold war American-DPRK relationship.
sentences.chinese: 兩次朝核危機構成了冷戰後美朝關係的主線。

sentences.english: Thanks to the American orchestra’s tour to Pyongyang, U.S.-North Korea relations will improve.
sentences.chinese: 由於美國樂團的平壤之旅，美朝關係將會改善。

sentences.english: UN chief backs direct US-DPRK talks.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國祕書長支持美朝直接對話。

sentences.english: But in fact, he was in the US-DPRK relations have played a key role.
sentences.chinese: 但事實上，他卻在美朝關係中卻扮演着關鍵角色。

sentences.english: How did the US and DPRK respond to direct dialogue or multi-lateral dialogue?
sentences.chinese: 美朝對進行直接對話或多邊對話有何反應？

sentences.english: We hope to see substantive results of the U.S.-DPRK dialogue.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望美朝之間的對話能夠取得實質性成果。

definition: North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
